data.name: Captain Bones: Prologue
data.detailed_description:
PLEASE ADD THE FULL VERSION TO YOUR WISHLIST

https://store.steampowered.com/app/951820


About the Game

This game is a free standalone version of the game "Captain Bones" and contains the beginning part of the story. You can use and try out most of the major mechanics.


The game is about Captain Bones being a great captain while he was an ordinary pirate crew member. It is an open world and survival game that takes place in the atmosphere of charming pirate islands, all hand-crafted.



You can generate new vehicles and weapons with materials collected from the environment to survive In the game. You can also make your raft and explore new islands. But beware, Captain Bones is still a sought-after pirate, with navy troops everywhere. He also has a curse, which often leaves him in difficult situations.



You can find many hidden handmade areas underwater. However, you have to be careful, because something is always watching you at sea.



Danger can always find you on the high seas. A good sailor must be prepared for any situation.

data.short_description: Captain Bones is an action-adventure game set in an open pirate world. You must have survival skills to make ship battles and treasure hunts with your crew.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 630, Radeon HD 5670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5200, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750, Radeon HD 7800
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
